A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Yuck.

One of the stupidest movies I've ever seen in my life.  Too many annoyingly cute animals.  This is Star Wars\, not Pokemon.  All the men were weak\, and all the women were self righteous and condescending.  Did Dr. Phil write this movie?  

The main character wasn't challenged in any way\, and overcame nothing.  A beloved character\, Luke Skywalker was destroyed.  All the "jokes" were juvenile and stupid.  I will never see another Rian Johnson movie again.
